keyMoments.title: Battles Dragon Number Thirteen
keyMoments.description: Half of the Straw Hat crew (Luffy, Zoro, Robin, Usopp) engage in combat with the artificial dragon on Punk Hazard's Burning Lands.
keyMoments.significance: First major crew battle in the Punk Hazard arc, showcasing their post-timeskip teamwork.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Dragon Number Thirteen
keyMoments.description: Through teamwork, with Usopp providing support and Zoro delivering the finishing blow, the Straw Hats defeat the massive dragon.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's enhanced abilities and coordination after the two-year timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Crew Members Captured
keyMoments.description: Sanji, Nami, Chopper, and Franky are captured by mysterious hazmat-suited figures after being knocked unconscious by sleeping gas, while Brook is left behind.
keyMoments.significance: Forces the crew into a separated state, creating parallel storylines and challenges for the Punk Hazard arc.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
